channel.title: Npc Vs Npc
channel.description:
i'm sure a few people has done it already ripped it from dynasty i take no credits except for ripping it out
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hljn5wsJQCs
didn't turn out exactly how i want it to be, but when i review the code and understand it[b] i will release[/b] it to the people who doesnt know how to do it and please no flaming just trying to contribute
oh yes it was placed onto my czar server i know why only the guard attacks the void guy, but not yet understand why they choose the void knight
[size=24pt][font=arial]I HAVE MADE A TUT ABOUT IT, GO READ IT AND PLEASE NO FLAMING AND DE-REPPING, JUST TRYING TO HELP[/font][/size]

item.title: Npc Vs Npc
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

i will release, but i dont understand the code of it, if i dont and release i will get flamed pretty badly

Read full topic

i know, but when i searched no result of the id, i need to test it out on a delta later, and check if it still happens

item.title: Npc Vs Npc
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Haha; I believe you have to use the IDs for the ID of which you’d like them to attack.

item.title: Npc Vs Npc
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:6, topic:370425”][quote author=recker450 link=topic=466530.msg3411928#msg3411928 date=1290747895]

Nice job, but I hate the game frame.
But anyways, that’s pretty cool though.

thnx im planning to release a tutorial once i review the code so i can explain it clearly
and thats what everyone says about the game frame -.-
[/quote]
You should make a tutorial.
And I wonder why they say that about the game frame…[/quote]
i will make a tutorial, i just ripped it out of dynasty, i should review the code first, i dunno why the hell the guard is picking on the void knight instead of those white knights…

Read full topic
